automation.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Section heading for automation preferences
**UI Location**: Settings → User Preferences (Automation section)
**When Users See This**: When viewing user preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Automation"
automation.changePreferences:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit changes to automation preferences
**UI Location**: Settings → User Preferences (Automation section, form footer)
**When Users See This**: After making changes to automation preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Change preferences"
automation.successMessage:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message after successfully updating preferences
**UI Location**: Settings → User Preferences (Automation section, form footer)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully submitting preference changes
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your preferences have been updated"
deleteProfile.deletePublicProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section about deleting a public profile
**UI Location**: Settings → Delete Profile (section header)
**When Users See This**: When navigating to the delete profile section within settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Delete your public profile"
deleteProfile.deleteProfileDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about what happens when a public profile is deleted
**UI Location**: Settings → Delete Profile (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When considering deleting their public profile
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "This will delete your public profile from the website. You can recreate your profile at any time, and the only data that will be deleted is links to your social profiles."
deleteProfile.deleteYourProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to initiate the public profile deletion process
**UI Location**: Settings → Delete Profile (button below description)
**When Users See This**: When a user decides to delete their public profile
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Delete your profile"
